metadata.rawHtml:
bankrewards.io

Moomoo

Bonus Details:

Get up to 15 free stocks when you make a qualified deposit + earn 8.1% APY on uninvested cash for 3 months + up to $300 in Cash Rewards if you transfer from another brokerage! Terms & Conditions Apply.

Bonus Requirements:

Make an initial transfer of $1000 or more into the brokerage account for the 15 stock bonus. Or, transfer $100 for the smaller 5 stock bonus.

Monthly Fees: None

Options Trading: Yes (option fees apply)

IRA Accounts: No

Account Type: Brokerage Account

Disclosure: Terms & Conditions Apply.

View Offer
See Other Offers

Some offer links may contain referrals, which will help us fund website improvements and maintenance.

bankrewards.io

Key Smart Checking®

Bonus Details:

$300 bonus

Bonus Requirement:

A single eligible direct deposit of $1000 or more within 60 days of account open. There is also a minimum $10 deposit to open the account. Your $300 bonus will be deposited into your account within 60 days of meeting requirements. Account must not be closed at the time of gift payment.

Monthly Fees: None

Availability: AK, CO, CT, ID, IN, MA, ME, MI, NY, OH, OR, PA, UT, VT, WA

Availability Details: Offer is only available in specified states.

Account Type: Personal Bank Account

Expiration: 5/16/2025

View Offer
See Other Offers

Some offer links may contain referrals, which will help us fund website improvements and maintenance.

bankrewards.io

WeBull

Bonus Details:

Get free shares based on the following tiers:

BonusInitial Deposit Amount
3 shares$0.01
20 shares$500
75 shares$25,000

Each share awarded by this bonus is worth an average of $3. E.g. 20 shares will be worth an average of $60 total. WeBull also provides 6 months of level 2 stock quotes and a 3.5% deposit bonus on IRA contributions.

Bonus Requirements:

Make an initial deposit of any amount to your brokerage account. Bonus will vary based on the above tiers.

Monthly Fees: None

Options Trading: Yes

IRA Accounts: Yes

Account Type: Brokerage Account

View Offer
See Other Offers

SoFi

Bonus Details:

$325 bonus: $25 on sign up and further $50 or $300 after qualifying direct deposits

Bonus Requirement:

Get $25 just for signing up. Make direct deposits totaling $1000 or more for an additional $50 bonus. Make direct deposits totaling $5000 or more for an extra $300 ($325 total).

Monthly Fees: None

Credit Inquiry: Soft Pull

Availability: Nationwide

Household Limit: None

Account Type: Personal Bank Account

United Explorer

Bonus Details:

Earn 60,000 United Mileage Plus points

Bonus Requirement:

Spend $3000 in 3 months

Card Perks: Free first checked bag. Priority boarding. $100 TSA precheck/Global Entry credit. 1 year of DashPass

Card Cash Back: 2x United, dining, hotel. 1x everything else. Estimated value of 1.2 cents per point

Under 5/24: Yes. If you have opened 5 or more new cards in the past 24 months, you will not be approved.

Annual Fees: Annual fee of $95. First year is waived

Foreign Transaction Fees: None 🙂

Credit Inquiry: Hard Pull

Availability: Nationwide

Expiration: None Listed
